name: CSS and JS Enqueuer
author: hiratatsuya

sections.description:
CSS and JS Enqueuer plugin will enable to enqueue external CSS and JS, and edit it.
You can customize the web site at only the dashboard.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the css-and-js-enqueuer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Open ‘Appearance’ -> ‘Enqueue CSS JSâ€™, and edit it.
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Added [disable wptexturize] feature.
  • Supported [Codemirror] Ver.5.48.2 (CDN).

0.1.1

  • slug is changed to [css-and-js-enqueuer] by [css-js-enqueuer].

0.1

  • release.
